$$
\sqrt[2003]{5 - 2\sqrt{6}} + \sqrt[2003]{5 + 2\sqrt{6}}
$$
is a root of $ P $.

          (5 + 2 * Real.sqrt (6 : ℝ)) ^ (1 / (2003 :
